content: गत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [गम्-क्त] {@--1@} Gone, departed, gone for ever; <ls>Mu. 1. 25</ls>; किं गते सलिले सेतुबंधेन, किं गते विवाहे नक्षत्रपरीक्षया <ls>Vb. 4.</ls> ‘what is the use of locking the stable-door when the steed is stolen?.’ {@--2@} Passed away, elapsed, past; गतायां रात्रौ. {@--3@} Dead, deceased, departed to the next world; <ls>Ku. 4. 30.</ls> {@--4@} Gone to, arrived at, reaching to. {@--5@} Being in, situated in, seated in, resting on, contained in; usually in <ab>comp.</ab>; प्रासादप्रांतगतः <ls>Pt. 1</ls> seated on &c.; सदोगतः <ls>R. 3. 66</ls> seated in the assembly; भर्तारं गता <ls>Ś. 4. 13.</ls> united to a husband; so आद्य°; सर्वगत existing everywhere. {@--6@} Fallen into, reduced to; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} आपद्गतः. {@--7@} Referring or relating to, with regard to, about, concerning, connected with (usually in <ab>comp.</ab>); राजा शकुंतलागतमेव चिंतयति <ls>Ś. 5</ls>; भर्तृगतया चिंतया <ls>Ś. 4</ls>: वयमपि भवत्यौ सखीगतं किमपि पृच्छामः <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; so पुत्रगतः स्नेहः &c. {@--8@} Frequented, resorted to; सुहृद्° <ls>Ku. 4. 24.</ls> {@--9@} Known, celebrated. {@--10@} Directed towards, belonging to. {@--11@} Known, understood. --तं {@--1@} Motion, going; गतमुपरि घनानां वारिगर्भोदराणां <ls>Ś. 7. 7</ls>; <ls>Śi. 1. 2</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">7. 4.</ls> {@--2@} Gait, manner of going; <ls>Ku. 1. 34</ls>; <ls>V. 4. 16.</ls> {@--3@} An event. {@--4@} The place where one has gone. {@--5@} Celebration, being known, diffusion. {@--6@} Manner. (As first member of <ab>comp.</ab> translated by ‘free from’, ‘bereft of’, ‘deprived of’, ‘without.’)
